mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.course_title, c.`subject`, c.speciality, c.exam, round(c.period, 1) AS period, c.learning_scope, c.course_type, u.nickname AS create_by, c.create_time, ur.nickname AS update_by, c.update_time, c.del_flag, IF (eqb.clazz_id IS NULL, 0, 1) AS questionBank, IF (c.exam_issue IS NULL, 0, c.exam_issue) AS questions FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN legion.t_user u ON u.id = c.create_by LEFT JOIN legion.t_user ur ON ur.id = c.update_by LEFT JOIN edu_exam_question_bank eqb ON eqb.clazz_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_exam_paper_rules eqr ON eqr.clazz_id = c.id
mapper.select:
and course_title like concat('%', #{course.courseTitle}, '%')
and
FIND_IN_SET( '${item}', c.`subject`)
and
FIND_IN_SET( '${item}', c.speciality)
and period = #{course.period}
and
FIND_IN_SET( '${item}', c.learning_scope)
and course_type = #{course.courseType}
and c.del_flag = #{course.delFlag}
and
FIND_IN_SET( '${item}', IF ( eqb.clazz_id IS NULL, 0, 1 ))
and
FIND_IN_SET( '${item}', IF ( c.exam_issue IS NULL, 0, c.exam_issue ))
ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT id FROM edu_course
FIND_IN_SET( '1', learning_scope) and del_flag = 1
and id not in
'${item}'

SELECT id FROM edu_course
FIND_IN_SET( '2', learning_scope) and del_flag = 1
and id not in
'${item}'

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT lr.user_id ) FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record lr ON c.id = lr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = lr.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE lr.study_type = 2 AND r.role_id = #{roleId} AND FIND_IN_SET( #{learningScope}, c.learning_scope) and c.course_type = #{courseType}
SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM edu_course WHERE course_type = #{courseType} and del_flag = 1

SELECT course_title as courseTitle, ( SELECT COUNT( user_id ) FROM edu_learning_record WHERE study_type = 2 AND course_type = course_type and id = course_id ) as num FROM edu_course WHERE course_type = #{courseType} and del_flag = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT course_title as courseTitle, ( SELECT COUNT( user_id ) FROM edu_learning_record WHERE study_type = 2 AND course_type = course_type and id = course_id ) as num, update_time as updateTime FROM edu_course WHERE course_type = #{courseType} AND FIND_IN_SET( #{learningScope}, learning_scope) and del_flag = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT ROUND(SUM(c.period), 1) as time FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record lr ON c.id = lr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = lr.user_id WHERE lr.study_type = 2 AND c.course_type = 1 AND lr.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT SUM(a.`time`) as pdfTime from ( SELECT DISTINCT lr.course_id, `time` FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record lr ON c.id = lr.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record_file lrf ON lrf.course_id = c.id AND lrf.course_id = lr.course_id AND lr.user_id = lrf.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = lr.user_id and u.user_id = lrf.user_id WHERE lr.study_type = 2 AND c.course_type = 2 AND lr.user_id = #{userId} ) a
